title: The Source Hip-Hop Music Awards 2000 [2000] 320kbps
description:
Album Info

The Source Hip Hop Music Awards 2000 presents 16 of the year's best hip-hop singles, as chosen by The Source magazine. DMX's "What's My Name," Mos Def's "Ms. Fat Booty," Jay-Z's "Jigga My Nigga," Beanie Sigel's "The Truth," and Redman & Method Man's "Da Rockwilder" are some of the standout tracks from the album. The official soundtrack of The Source's annual Hip-Hop Awards show, it's also a good overview of contemporary hip-hop trends.

Track Listing



   1 What's My Name? - DMX
   2 Forgot About Dre - Dr. Dre and Eminem
   3 Jigga My Nigga - Jay-Z
   4 Bling Bling - B.G.
   5 Vivrant Thing - Q-Tip
   6 You Owe Me - Nas and Ginuwine
   7 Whoa! - Black Rob
   8 Quiet Storm - Mobb Deep and Lil' Kim (Remix)
   9 Da Rockwilder - Method Man and Redman
   10 Back That Azz Up - Juvenile
   11 Cherchez LaGhost - Ghostface Killah
   12 Bitch Please - Snoop Dogg and Xzibit
   13 The Truth - Beanie Sigel
   14 Got Beef - Tha Eastsidaz, Jayo Felony and Sylk-E. Fyne
   15 Wild Out - The LOX
   16 Ms. Fat Booty - Mos Def
   17 Cold Hearted - Made Men and Wise Guys
